● Now I have the full picture. Here's the current state:

  What's Built

  Console page (/console):
  - Master terminal (that's me when running inside the operator) — full interactive PTY via xterm.js
  - Worker panel on the right — shows mini-terminal cards (9px font, read-only, live binary WS streaming)
  - Spawn worker via + button or Swarm mode
  - Stopped workers persist (dimmed) with dismiss button
  - Click a worker card opens /terminals#workerId

  Terminals page (/terminals):
  - Full interactive xterm.js terminals (120x30, 10K scrollback)
  - Tab/grid views, 8 color themes, search, keyboard shortcuts
  - Binary WS for each terminal

  Worker lifecycle (claude-pool.mjs):
  - Spawn → running → auto-dispatch claims tasks → auto-complete on 30s idle → respawn via auto-handoff
  - Context refresh (detect "context window full" → git commit → fresh respawn with -c)
